REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F E f0861 reute r f BC-AETNA-<AET>-TO-SELL-C 03-05 0064

TEXT.TITLE: AETNA <AET> TO SELL CANADIAN OPERATIONS
TEXT.BODY: Aetna Life and Casualty Co said its Aetna Life and Casualty of Canada Ltd subsidiary has agreed in prnciple to sell its casualty-property subsidiary, Aetna Casualty Co of Canada to <Laurentian Group> of Montreal for undisclosed terms. The company said the agreement is subject to Canadian government approval. Reuter
